Health.headline: Brain-Boosting Breathing Trick to Sharpen Memory, Focus, and Emotional Control
Health.summary: This article offers a simple breathing technique that can be performed before work or study to enhance cognitive functions such as memory and focus. The trick also promises improved emotional control, making it a valuable daily practice.
key_points: Provides a breathing technique for brain-boosting.
Aims to sharpen memory and focus.
Promises improved emotional control.

Health.headline: FSSAI Orders Testing of Eggs for Banned Antibiotics After Nitrofurans Controversy
Health.summary: Following the nitrofurans row, the FSSAI has issued a directive for all eggs to be tested for banned antibiotics. This order aims to ensure food safety and public health, preventing the consumption of contaminated products.
key_points: FSSAI ordered testing of eggs for banned antibiotics.
Decision follows the nitrofurans controversy.
Aims to ensure food safety and public health.

Health.headline: Rapid Expansion: 468 Hospitals Empanelled Under CGHS in 2025
Health.summary: The Central Government Health Scheme (CGHS) has seen rapid expansion in 2025, with 468 new hospitals being empanelled. This significant increase aims to enhance access to healthcare services for government employees and pensioners across the country.
key_points: CGHS saw rapid expansion in 2025.
468 new hospitals empanelled.
Aims to enhance healthcare access for beneficiaries.

Health.headline: Nearly 50% of Posts Vacant in Pollution Control Panels
Health.summary: A significant concern has been raised as nearly 50% of the posts in various pollution control panels remain vacant. This critical shortage of staff could severely hamper efforts to monitor and curb pollution, impacting environmental and public health.
key_points: Almost half of pollution control panel posts are vacant.
Staff shortage could hinder pollution monitoring and control.
Impacts environmental and public health efforts.

Health.headline: Natural Ways to Cover Grey Hair Without Causing Damage
Health.summary: This article offers various natural methods for covering grey hair, emphasizing techniques that avoid damage to the hair strands. It provides practical advice for maintaining hair health while addressing premature greying concerns.
key_points: Provides natural methods for covering grey hair.
Emphasizes avoiding damage to hair strands.
Offers practical advice for hair health.
